meanings.definition: The method and practice of teaching.
meanings.sent1: Effective pedagogy involves engaging students in interactive learning activities.
meanings.sent2: Teachers use pedagogy to plan lessons and assess student understanding.
meanings.sent3: The playful pedagogy of the kindergarten teacher kept the children excited about learning.
meanings.sent4: Her innovative pedagogy was like a beacon of light in the world of education.
meanings.sent5: The pedagogy of storytelling made the lesson unforgettable for the students.

meanings.definition: The art or science of teaching; education; instructional methods.
meanings.sent1: Modern pedagogy emphasizes the importance of student-centered learning.
meanings.sent2: Pedagogy plays a crucial role in shaping the future of society through education.
meanings.sent3: The magician's pedagogy of illusion left the audience in awe of his teaching skills.
meanings.sent4: Her pedagogy was a symphony of knowledge and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The pedagogy of gardening taught the children valuable lessons about growth and care.
